name: Dino Rider - Island Survival
description:
Become a mighty dino rider and explore the thriving wilderness of this prehistoric island! Choose the dino of your dreams and dip into the atmosphere of eternal challenging missions and thrilling dinosaur’s quests! Check this amazing Dino Rider - Island Survival game and do everything possible to survive – explore, fight, hunt, gather, craft and just have fun!

Dino Rider - Island Survival features:
• Vast expanses of prehistoric surroundings
• Six types of dinosaur mounts to choose
• Many unlockable skins for each mount
• Amazing exploration, fighting, gathering and other quests
• A chance to power all the stats up
• Unique preferences for each dinosaur
• Mighty mammoth and sabretooth tiger as the main rivals
• Thriving wilderness made in 3D graphics

Download Dino Rider - Island Survival game and learn more about the real life of some prehistoric creatures and beasts riding a real dinosaur!
